(Mentioned) | History = NASA's history is presumably similar to their [[Earth-616]] [[National Aeronautics and Space Administration (Earth-616)|counterpart]]'s. NASA was mentioned by [[Leonard Samson (Earth-TRN008)|Leonard Samson]] as the organization had once launched a satellite named Harbinger into orbit but never used it and was now being used by the [[Division (Earth-TRN008)|Division]] as a means of tracking the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-TRN008)|Hulk]] by his unique gamma energy signature.{{r|Incredible Hulk: Ultimate Destruction}} | Equipment = Satellites | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Historical Organizations]] [[Category:American Organizations]]
